name: gulp-check-grep
description: Gulp plugin to check for a pattern through files and fail when found

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec $(find ./test -name *.tests.js) && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Sophilabs
